channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 欧盟于周一正式启动了一项海军任务，以保护红海航运免受也门胡蒂叛军的袭击，因为该组织的袭击迫使一艘船的船员弃船，并损坏了另一艘船。
item.description:
The EU formally launched a naval mission on Monday to protect Red Sea shipping from Yemen's Huthi rebels as attacks by the group forced the crew of one vessel to abandon ship and damaged another.

u.afp.com/5NeT

item.title: R to @AFP：以色列警告说，除非哈马斯释放所有人质，否则它将在穆斯林斋月期间继续发动进攻，包括在最南部的拉法地区。
item.description:
Deadly fighting raged on in Gaza as Israel warned that unless Hamas frees all hostages it will push on with its offensive during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, including in the far-southern Rafah area.
u.afp.com/5Neg

item.title: R to @AFP：#更新：阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀指责弗拉基米尔-普京总统杀害了她的丈夫，并发誓要在他上周死于俄罗斯北极监狱后继续他毕生的事业。
item.description:
#UPDATE Alexei Navalny's widow accused President Vladimir Putin of killing her husband and vowed to continue his life's work following his death last week in a Russian Arctic prison.
u.afp.com/5Nsr

item.title: #意大利冠军那不勒斯解雇教练沃尔特-马扎里：主席 #AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Italian champions Napoli sack coach Walter Mazzarri: president
#AFPSports

item.title:
2015 年，哈维-埃尔南德斯在捧起辉煌的三冠王奖杯后离开了巴塞罗那，但他作为教练第二次胜利告别的希望已经破灭。
#AFPSports
item.description:
Xavi Hernandez left Barcelona in 2015 after lifting a glorious treble, but his hopes of a second triumphant farewell as coach have been whittled away.
u.afp.com/5NsD
#AFPSports

item.title: 九个世纪以来，印度人一直在巴巴-哈吉-罗兹比（Baba Haji Rozbih）的森林圣地祈祷。巴巴-哈吉-罗兹比（Baba Haji Rozbih）是一位受人尊敬的苏菲派圣人，他的墓地是首都德里最古老的伊斯兰遗址之一。
item.description:
For nine centuries, Indians prayed at the forest shrine of Baba Haji Rozbih, a revered Sufi saint whose grave is one of the capital Delhi's oldest Islamic sites.
u.afp.com/5NsL

item.title: 乌克兰东部城镇阿夫迪耶夫卡落入莫斯科军队之手，俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死亡，美国对基辅的军事援助正在减少。
item.description:
The eastern Ukrainian town of Avdiivka has fallen to Moscow's troops, Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny is dead and US military aid to Kyiv is waning.

u.afp.com/5Nsu

item.title: #也门胡塞武装称两艘美国军舰在亚丁湾遭到袭击
item.description: #BREAKING Yemen Huthis say two American ships targeted in Gulf of Aden

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（Antonio Guterres）说，阿富汗当局拒绝了多哈会谈的邀请，驻阿富汗的国际特使们希望塔利班能参加他们今后的会议。
item.description:
UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said international envoys to Afghanistan hope for Taliban participation at their future meetings after the authorities snubbed an invitation to talks in Doha.

u.afp.com/5NsQ

item.title: #BREAKING 二十六个欧盟国家呼吁立即暂停加沙 "人道主义行动
item.description: #BREAKING Twenty-six EU countries call for immediate Gaza 'humanitarian pause'

item.title: R to @AFP：#唐纳德-特朗普在一份声明中结束了对阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼逝世的长时间沉默，声明避免了对克里姆林宫的批评，而是将这位俄罗斯反对派领导人的突然去世描绘成美国崩溃的标志。
item.description:
#UPDATE Donald Trump ended his lengthy silence on the death of Alexei Navalny, in a statement that avoided criticism of the Kremlin and instead portrayed the Russian opposition leader's sudden passing as a sign of a collapsing United States.
u.afp.com/5NsY

item.title: 每隔两个月，米开朗基罗 1504 年完成的杰作就会在其位于佛罗伦萨阿卡德米亚美术馆的家中接受一次仔细的清洗，这幅杰作已经在这里驻留了 150 多年。
item.description:
Every two months, Michelangelo's masterpiece completed in 1504 undergoes a careful cleaning at its home in Florence's Accademia Gallery, where it has resided for over 150 years.

u.afp.com/5Ns5

item.title: R to @AFP：#BREAKING Oliver Glasner named as new Crystal Palace manager: club #AFPSports
item.description: #BREAKING Oliver Glasner named as new Crystal Palace manager: club #AFPSports

item.title: R to @AFP：#俄罗斯调查人员将保留阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的尸体 "至少两周"，以便对尸体进行检查。
item.description:
#UPDATE Russian investigators will keep Alexei Navalny's body for "at least two weeks" to examine the corpse, his spokesperson said, describing it as a ploy by the authorities.
u.afp.com/5Ns4

item.title:
视频：🇯🇵 日本 "裸男节 "因人口老龄化而屈服
数百名男子为争夺一袋护身符而大打出手，为这个有着千年历史的仪式画上了一个戏剧性的句号。但由于当地人口老龄化严重，这一仪式将是最后一次。
📹 @atishpatel 📷 @fong_fifi #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇯🇵 Japan's 'naked men' festival succumbs to population ageing

Hundreds of men tussle over a bag of talismans, in a dramatic end to a thousand-year-old ritual. But the rite will be the last as ageing locals struggle to keep up.

📹 @atishpatel
📷 @fong_fifi
#AFPVertical

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 罗伊-霍奇森周一卸任英超劲旅水晶宫队主教练一职，就在水晶宫队与保级对手埃弗顿队的关键比赛前几个小时 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description: #UPDATE Roy Hodgson stepped down as manager of Premier League strugglers Crystal Palace on Monday, just hours before their crucial clash with relegation rivals Everton ➡️ u.afp.com/5NmH #AFPSports

item.title: 澳大利亚马术运动员谢恩-罗斯（Shane Rose）周一因在马术障碍赛中穿着 "人字拖 "而逃脱处罚，从而得以继续备战今夏的巴黎奥运会 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description: Australian equestrian Shane Rose escaped punishment on Monday for wearing a "mankini" during a showjumping competition, allowing him to resume preparations for this summer's Paris Olympics ⬇️ u.afp.com/5NmL #AFPSports

item.title:
视频：🇲🇽 墨西哥大选前的抗议活动
数千人走上墨西哥城街头，要求 "自由投票"，指责政府在投票活动正式开始前就进行干预。
📹 Jose OSORIO, @privat_camille, @alfred_kitto 📸 @mironlibre #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇲🇽 Pre-election protests in Mexico

Thousands took to the streets of Mexico City to demand a "free vote", accusing the government of interfering in the poll campaign before it officially began.

📹 Jose OSORIO, @privat_camille, @alfred_kitto
📸 @mironlibre
#AFPVertical

item.title:
视频：纳瓦尔尼遗孀指责普京杀害纳瓦尔尼，誓言继续工作
尤利娅-纳瓦尔尼娅（Yulia Navalnaya）指责普京总统杀害了克里姆林宫的批评家，并发誓要在纳瓦尔尼死于北极监狱三天后继续他的工作。
阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼 Youtube 频道，afptv #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: Navalny's widow accuses Putin of killing him, vows to continue work

Yulia Navalnaya accuses President Putin of killing the Kremlin critic and vows to continue his work, three days after he died in an Arctic prison.

📹 ALEXEI NAVALNY YOUTUBE CHANNEL, AFPTV
#AFPVertical

item.title: 欧盟周一宣布，根据一项具有里程碑意义的数字内容监管新法律，对视频分享应用 TikTok 涉嫌违反未成年人在线保护义务一事展开正式调查 ⬇️
item.description: The EU on Monday announced a formal investigation into video-sharing app TikTok over alleged breaches of its obligations to protect minors online, under a landmark new law on policing digital content ⬇️ u.afp.com/5Nmi

item.title: 视频：海洋生物学家在南极洲采集座头鲸和豹斑海豹的皮肤样本，检测它们体内是否存在汞
item.description: VIDEO: Marine biologists collect skin samples from humpback whales and leopard seals in Antarctica to detect the presence of mercury in their bodies

item.title: 在塞内加尔 2 月推迟的总统选举中获准参选的 20 名候选人中，有 15 人呼吁最迟于 4 月 2 日举行新的投票 ➡️
item.description: Fifteen of the 20 candidates who were approved to stand in Senegal's delayed February presidential poll have called for the new vote to be held no later than April 2 ➡️ u.afp.com/5NW8

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周一宣布竞选连任欧盟委员会主席，誓言要捍卫欧盟，抵御旨在分裂欧盟的势力。
item.description:
#UPDATE Ursula von der Leyen announced Monday her bid for a second term as chief of the European Commission, vowing to defend the bloc from forces aiming to divide it.
tinyurl.com/yry5wkvm

item.title: 在塞内加尔 2 月推迟的总统选举中获准参选的 20 名候选人中，有 15 人呼吁最迟于 4 月 2 日举行新的投票。
item.description:
Fifteen of the 20 candidates who were approved to stand in Senegal's delayed February presidential poll have called for the new vote to be held no later than April 2.
tinyurl.com/4wv85e2u

item.title: R to @AFP：#军方消息人士告诉法新社，缅甸军政府已判处三名准将死刑，他们上个月率领数百名士兵投降，并将中国边境的一个战略重镇交给了少数民族战士。
item.description:
#UPDATE Myanmar's junta has sentenced to death three brigadier generals who surrendered with hundreds of troops and handed over a strategic town on the Chinese border to ethnic minority fighters last month, military sources told AFP.
tinyurl.com/26kysv6t

item.title: R to @AFP：#阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀周一说，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京杀害了她的丈夫，她发誓要继承他的事业。
item.description:
#UPDATE Alexei Navalny's widow said Monday that Russian President Vladimir Putin killed her husband, as she vowed to carry on his work, three days after he died in an Arctic prison.
tinyurl.com/yw2mtdsx

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：阿富汗灾害管理部发言人周一表示，在阿富汗东部的努里斯坦省，一场大雪引发的山体滑坡已造成 25 人死亡，8 人受伤。
item.description:
#UPDATE A landslide caused by heavy snowfall has killed 25 people and injured eight others in the eastern Afghan province of Nuristan, a disaster management ministry spokesman said on Monday.
tinyurl.com/3vma7z7k

item.title: 视频：泰国前总理他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）在结束长达 15 年的自我流放生涯后戏剧性地返回泰国，被捕仅六个月后就从警察医院返回曼谷家中。
item.description: VIDEO: The former Thai prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra arrives back at his Bangkok home from a police hospital just six months after he was arrested following a dramatic return to the kingdom from 15 years of self-imposed exile.
